column1: Perioral dermatitis is a skin disorder in which tiny red bumps form around the mouth and lower half of the face.

Treatment may include medicines placed on the skin such as: - Metronidazole - Erythromycin - Benzoyl peroxide - Tacrolimus - Clindamycin - Pimecrolimus - Sodium sulfacetamide with sulfur You may need to take antibiotic pills if the condition is severe.
